synopsis.text: They were once the protectors of hope, but now they're all grown up. In celebration of the 20th anniversary of the Precure franchise, a new anime series takes us on a nostalgic journey with Nozomi Yumehara and her friends from 'Yes! Precure 5', 'Yes! Precure 5 GoGo!', and 'Futari wa Precure: Splashâ˜†Star'. This time, they're navigating the complexities of adulthood, from professional pursuits to personal relationships. But when a mysterious threat emerges, the power to transform isn't just a distant memory. As the clocktower bell chimes, these grown-up Precures must confront new challenges and embark on a fresh adventure. Will they be able to balance their adult lives with their duties as protectors? Join Nozomi and her friends as they step into a new chapter of their lives, proving that heroes never truly grow old.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
